body:
I understand why I was demoted, their was  many things I put in front of Avicus so that I can moderate and play with my friends. A lot of things that's family based. I practically spend 15 hours a day Playing Minecraft, about 10 hours of Avicus and 5 hours of over servers, 7 of those hours I mainly search out for rule breakers (During Vacation). Whenever I was on probation for a week, I tried my hardest for online reports and in-game. I wont be leaving the community anytime soon, and im not Applying for staff again. This server has a very good community and I'm glad to have that.
EDIT: I don't feel like typing much right now since their is too much to explain how it was from my position.

Sincerely,
Emmy <3

replies.body: Wow! That's ridiculous. I was talking to Emerald one day and he told me he was on the verge of getting demoted. I was like "What the heck?!?!?!? You are one of the best mods ever!" He always answers my reports and a few days ago 2 whole infraction pages were filled with his bans/kicks/warns/tempbans, all of it! I think it was a stupid decision to demote him. I don't know who demoted him but I think it was a bad decision. I respect the staffs decision but I thought Emerald was a great mod and did not deserve the demotion. I broke my keyboard like Tino. So now I can't type anymore im soaduoiweufpiwuergfhawrhfaworhg[oawre;jeiogjsdkgfjvks vjw4orioergioergj....

replies.body:
Emmy, 

You will always be my friend no matter what, the day you added me to the Skype call I was confused as heck... But you made me feel like I belonged. The more I got to know you the more knowledge I became. This is a really sad moment and I might just start crying while I'm typing this.. Every Time I would come on the server using Minechat you would usually be the first one that said "Hi" and I thank you for that, it made me feel as though I was part of the community. You were an amazing mod and helped us deal with the most annoying players ever. Its really sad that you were sleeping while this happened.. But don't worry in my eyes and heart you are still one of the best friends I have ever made online. Thanks for being amazing Emmy!

replies.body:
Like with all the other moderators (including me xP) you had your ups and downs. Sadly most people dont know how many downs any of the moderators have.
I do agree with everyone that you had some good times as an efficient moderator, but at most times it just didnt happen.
It was nice with you as a mod, but I know it will be nice with you as an awesome player in the community. Continue being as shiny as en emerald ;)
